name: STEM Excellence High School Scholarship
description: Annual scholarship for high school students excelling in STEM fields. $2,500 award for students demonstrating outstanding achievement in science, technology, engineering, or mathematics.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Science, Technology

name: Women in Technology High School Award
description: Supporting female high school students pursuing technology careers. $3,000 scholarship for girls interested in computer science, software engineering, and IT fields.

name: Engineering Future Leaders High School Scholarship
description: $2,000 scholarship for high school students planning to pursue engineering degrees. Open to students in grades 10-12 with strong math and science backgrounds.

name: Minority STEM Champions High School Scholarship
description: $2,500 award for underrepresented minority students in STEM. Supporting African American, Hispanic, and Native American high school students pursuing science and engineering.

name: Computer Science Innovators High School Award
description: Recognizing high school students innovating in computer science. $1,500 scholarship for students with programming projects, apps, or computer science achievements.

name: Mathematics Excellence High School Scholarship
description: $2,000 award for high school students excelling in mathematics. For students with outstanding math grades and participation in math competitions.

name: Science Research High School Scholarship
description: Supporting high school students conducting original scientific research. $3,000 award for students with science fair projects or research publications.

name: First Generation STEM High School Scholarship
description: $2,500 scholarship for first-generation high school students in STEM. Supporting students whose parents did not complete college.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Science, Technology

name: Robotics and Automation High School Award
description: $1,500 scholarship for high school students in robotics. For students participating in robotics clubs, competitions, or building robotic systems.

name: Environmental Science High School Scholarship
description: Supporting high school environmentalists. $2,000 award for students passionate about environmental conservation and sustainability.

name: Physics and Astronomy High School Award
description: $2,500 scholarship for high school physics and astronomy enthusiasts. For students with strong physics grades and interest in space sciences.

name: Chemistry Achievement High School Scholarship
description: Recognizing excellence in chemistry. $1,500 award for high school students with outstanding chemistry performance and lab skills.

name: Biomedical Science High School Scholarship
description: $3,000 award for high school students interested in biomedical sciences. Supporting future healthcare researchers and medical scientists.

name: Cybersecurity High School Scholarship
description: Supporting future cybersecurity professionals. $2,000 scholarship for high school students interested in information security and ethical hacking.

name: Data Science and Analytics High School Award
description: $1,500 scholarship for high school students exploring data science. For students with coding and statistical analysis skills.

name: Aerospace Engineering High School Scholarship
description: Supporting aspiring aerospace engineers. $2,500 award for high school students passionate about aviation and space exploration.

name: Artificial Intelligence High School Scholarship
description: $3,000 award for high school students exploring AI and machine learning. Supporting the next generation of AI researchers.

name: Biology Excellence High School Scholarship
description: Recognizing outstanding biology students. $2,000 award for high school students with exceptional biology grades and lab work.

name: Software Development High School Award
description: $1,500 scholarship for high school programmers and developers. For students with coding portfolios or software projects.

name: Renewable Energy High School Scholarship
description: Supporting clean energy advocates. $2,500 award for high school students passionate about renewable energy and sustainability.

name: Rural STEM Students High School Scholarship
description: $2,000 scholarship specifically for rural high school students in STEM. Addressing STEM education gaps in rural communities.
